name: The In Crowd
description:
The In Crowd is a satirical RPG set in a typical high school.

Timmy, on his birthday, has an encounter with bullies, sending him into a rage filled rampage to bring a beatdown against his oppressors … using his words.

With an insult-based combat system, provoke your bullies and destroy their self esteem by embarrassing them in front of their followers; Learn new vocabulary for the sole purpose of demeaning your peers; Determine your foes weakness to focus your abuse for extra efficiency; Grow your following after each and every encounter as you dominate the entire school.

Please make sure to leave us some feedback on our game! It is vital that we receive feedback in order to improve our game.

Feedback Form:
https://forms.gle/nUQf9qaFQQWPVis4A
